query: Can you find artworks related to Van Gogh in the Art Institute of Chicago's collection, and generate an avatar with a 'pixel-art' style using the name 'ArtLover' as the seed?
answer:
Here are some artworks related to Van Gogh from the Art Institute of Chicago's collection:

1. **The Bedroom**
   - ![The Bedroom](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/28560/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to the artwork](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/28560)

2. **Self-Portrait**
   - ![Self-Portrait](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/80607/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to the artwork](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/80607)

3. **The Poet's Garden**
   - ![The Poet's Garden](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/14586/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to the artwork](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/14586)

4. **A Peasant Woman Digging in Front of Her Cottage**
   - ![A Peasant Woman Digging in Front of Her Cottage](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/28862/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to the artwork](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/28862)

5. **The Drinkers**
   - ![The Drinkers](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/79349/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to the artwork](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/79349)

6. **Fishing in Spring, the Pont de Clichy (Asnières)**
   - ![Fishing in Spring, the Pont de Clichy (Asnières)](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/109314/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to the artwork](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/109314)

7. **Madame Roulin Rocking the Cradle (La berceuse)**
   - ![Madame Roulin Rocking the Cradle (La berceuse)](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/27949/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to the artwork](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/27949)

8. **Terrace and Observation Deck at the Moulin de Blute-Fin, Montmartre**
   - ![Terrace and Observation Deck at the Moulin de Blute-Fin, Montmartre](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/27954/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to the artwork](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/27954)

9. **Grapes, Lemons, Pears, and Apples**
   - ![Grapes, Lemons, Pears, and Apples](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/64957/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to the artwork](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/64957)

10. **Weeping Tree**
    - ![Weeping Tree](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/52733/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
    - [Link to the artwork](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/52733)
